name: mcbe-translate-viewer
description: View Minecraft Bedrock Edition translation strings inline in your code. Automatically detects resource packs and overlays translate key values.

mcbeTranslateViewer.defaultLanguage.description: Default language file to use for translations (e.g., en_US, es_ES, de_DE)

mcbeTranslateViewer.resourcePackPaths.description: Additional paths to resource packs for translation lookups. Useful when resource packs are not in the workspace.

mcbeTranslateViewer.showInlineTranslatio.description: Show inline decorations with translation values

mcbeTranslateViewer.inlineMaxLength.description: Maximum length of inline translation preview before truncating

mcbeTranslateViewer.decorationStyle.description: Where to show translation decorations: 'inline' replaces the key, 'after' shows it after the key

mcbeTranslateViewer.highlightMissingTran.description: Highlight translate keys that don't have a translation value

mcbeTranslateViewer.useVanillaTranslatio.description: Include vanilla Minecraft Bedrock Edition translations as defaults. Your resource pack translations will override these.
